org.livingdoc.engine.execution.examples

Class UtilKt

  • org.livingdoc.engine.execution.examples.UtilKt

  • public class UtilKt

    • Method Detail

      • executeWithBeforeAndAfter

        public static <T> T executeWithBeforeAndAfter(@NotNull
                                              kotlin.jvm.functions.Function0<kotlin.Unit> before,
                                              @NotNull
                                              kotlin.jvm.functions.Function0<? extends T> body,
                                              @NotNull
                                              kotlin.jvm.functions.Function0<kotlin.Unit> after)

        This function executes a before hook, the main function and an after hook in this order. It ensures, that the after hook is executed even if there was an exception in before or main function

        Parameters:
        before - the function that is called before the main part
        body - the main function
        after - the function that is called after the main part
